sentences.text: For avoidance of doubt, Monthly Compensation does not include stock options granted to Directors or the Shares allocated pursuant to Section 5 of this Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (r)    Monthly Deferral Participant means a Director who is not, and for the preceding 12 months has not been, a salaried employee of the Company and who elects to defer all or part of his or her Monthly Compensation pursuant to the Plan in accordance with Section 4 hereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (s)    Participant means any current or former Director with an outstanding Account balance in the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (t)    Plan means The Lilly Directors Deferral Plan, as amended and restated herein
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (u)    Plan Administrator means the Directors and Corporate Governance Committee of the Board of Directors, or any successor committee of the Board of Directors that is charged with matters relating to the compensation of non-employee directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Except with respect to Section 5(f) of this Plan, the Plan Administrator may at its discretion delegate any of its responsibilities to one or more individuals provided that such delegation is in accordance with applicable laws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v)    Plan Year means the calendar year from January 1 through December 31 with respect to which compensation eligible for deferral under the Plan is earned.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (w)    Section 409A means section 409A of the Code and the Treasury regulations and other official guidance promulgated thereunder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (x)    Separation from Service means a separation from service within the meaning of Section 409A.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (y)     Share means a share of common stock of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (z)    Unforeseeable Emergency means a severe financial hardship of a Participant resulting from an illness or accident of such Participant or Beneficiary, such Participants spouse or a dependent (as defined in section 152(a) of the Code) of such Participant, loss of such Participants property due to casualty, or other similar extraordinary and unforeseeable circumstances arising as a result of events beyond the control of such Participant, each as determined in the manner consistent with Section 409A, and any other event or circumstance within the meaning of the term unforeseeable emergency under Section 409A.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (aa)    Valuation Date means for any month, the third Monday of the month, or if Shares are not traded on the New York Stock Exchange on such third Monday, the next day on which Shares are traded on the New York Stock Exchange.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 2.Plan Administrator
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a)    Authority.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan Administrator shall have full authority to administer the Plan in accordance with its terms and to exercise all responsibilities and authorities as provided herein, including the discretionary authorities to determine the terms and conditions of deferrals of compensation under the Plan, to determine the terms and conditions of crediting to and distributing from Accounts under the terms of the Plan, and to adopt such rules and regulations for administering the Plan as it may deem necessary or appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan Administrator has the discretionary authority to interpret and construe all provisions of the Plan, to remedy possible ambiguities, inconsistencies, or omissions under the Plan, and to resolve all questions of fact arising under the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The decisions of the Plan Administrator shall be final, binding and conclusive on all parties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No member of the Board, the Plan Administrator nor any officers of the Company shall have any liability for any action or determination taken under the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b)    Delegation; Expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The appropriate officer(s) of the Company as designated by the Plan Administrator are authorized to act on behalf of the Plan Administrator for the day-to-day administration of the Plan, subject to the authority of the Plan Administrator.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Expenses of the administration of the Plan may be borne by the Company or may be deducted from Participants Accounts at the sole discretion of the Plan Administrator.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 3.Participation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan Administrator may require a Participant to comply with such terms and conditions as the Plan Administrator may specify in order for the Participant to participate in the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 4.Elections to Participate
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a)    Deferral Elections.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Monthly Deferral Participant in the Plan may file an Election Form with the Plan Administrator on or before the date specified in accordance with Section 4(c) hereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Election Form shall permit the Monthly Deferral Participant to specify the Deferral Amount, subject to a minimum annual Deferral Amount of five thousand dollars ($5,000), for the deferral of Monthly Compensation, or such amounts as may be specified by the Plan Administrator in its sole discretion, and whether such Deferral Amount shall be credited in cash to his or her Deferred Compensation Account or in Shares to his or her Deferred Stock Account, pursuant to Section 5(a) hereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Election Form shall also set forth the terms of distribution of the Participants Account in accordance with Section 6 hereof and the Participants Beneficiary designation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All elections to defer compensation under the Plan are irrevocable, and no changes to any Election Form delivered to the Plan Administrator shall be permitted, except as specifically provided under the terms of the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b)    Maximum Deferrals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Monthly Deferral Participant may elect a Deferral Amount of up to 100% of he Participants Monthly Compensation for a Plan Year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: One hundred percent (100%) of any annual allocation of Shares
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: earned pursuant to Section 5(c) will be automatically credited to a Deferred Stock Participants Deferred Stock Account.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c)    Timing and Effect of Elections.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless otherwise specified by the Plan Administrator in accordance with the requirements of Section 409A, deferral elections on an Election Form shall be made:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i)    In the case of Monthly Compensation or an annual Share allocation not qualifying as performance-based compensation within the meaning of Section 409A, prior to the beginning of the Plan Year with respect to which the compensation is earned; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii)    In the case of Monthly Compensation or an annual Share allocation which the Plan Administrator has determined qualifies as performance-based compensation within the meaning of Section 409A, no later than June 30th of the applicable Plan Year with respect to which the compensation is earned.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deferral elections shall apply to Monthly Compensation and annual Share allocations with respect to the Plan Year for which the elections are made.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Participants will be required to make deferral elections for future Plan Years at such times to be specified by the Plan Administrator in accordance with the foregoing.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a Participant does not file an Election Form with the Plan Administrator on or before the deadline established by the Plan Administrator for deferral elections for a Plan Year, a Participant will be deemed not to have elected to defer Monthly Compensation for such Plan Year, as applicable.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notwithstanding the foregoing, in the first year in which an individual who is newly elected or appointed to serve as a Director becomes eligible to participate in the Plan, such individual may, not later than thirty (30) days after the date he or she becomes eligible to participate in the Plan, elect in accordance with the preceding provisions of this Section 4, to defer the receipt of Monthly Compensation and set forth the terms of distribution of the individual's Account with respect to services to be performed after the filing of the election with the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 5.Accounts and Interest Credits
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a)    Participant Accounts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accounts shall be maintained for each Participant under the Plan:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i)    Deferred Compensation Account  The Company shall maintain a Deferred Compensation Account in the name of each Monthly Deferral Participant who elects to have a Deferral Amount credited in cash pursuant to Section 4 hereof for a given Plan Year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Deferred Compensation Account shall be denominated in U.S. dollars, rounded to the nearest whole cent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For each month, Deferral Amounts allocated to a Deferred Compensation Account shall be credited to the Deferred Compensation Account as of the last Business Day of the month.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii)    Deferred Stock Account  The Company shall maintain a Deferred Stock Account for each Deferred Stock Participant and for each Monthly Deferral Participant who elects to have a Deferral Amount credited in Shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Deferred Stock Account shall be denominated in Shares and maintained in fractions rounded to three (3) decimal places.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deferral Amounts intended to be allocated to a Deferred Stock Account shall be credited to on a monthly basis, as soon as administratively feasible following the Deferred Stock Account as of Valuation Date for the applicable month, but in no event later than the last Business Day of the month such month.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The annual allocations of Shares for Deferred Stock Participants described in section (c) below shall be credited to the applicable Deferred Stock Account on the Annual Allocation Date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares and, if necessary, fractional Shares, shall be credited based upon the closing price of Shares on the New York Stock Exchange on the Valuation Date for that month.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of the Plan, Shares allocated to each Share a Deferred Stock Account shall be hypothetical and not issued or transferred by the Company until payment is made pursuant to Section 6 hereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Participants Account shall consist of book entries only and shall not constitute a separate cash or Share fund or other asset held in trust or as security for the Companys obligation to pay the amount of the Account to the Participant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The balance of a Participants Account shall be adjusted pursuant to this Section 5 and reduced by the amount of applicable tax withholding, distributions and expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Participants Account may include sub-accounts as the Company considers necessary or advisable for purposes of maintaining a proper accounting of amounts credited or debited for a Participant under the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Participant shall receive or have on-line access to a statement of such Participants Account no less frequently than once a year following the end of each Plan Year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b)    Crediting of Deferral Amount.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Participant who has filed an Election Form with the Plan Administrator for the deferral of Monthly Compensation with respect to a Plan Year shall have the Deferral Amount
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: deducted from the applicable compensation and credited to the Participants appropriate Account under the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Deferral Amount so credited shall be reduced by applicable tax withholding, distributions and expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c)    Annual Share Allocation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of On the Annual Allocation Date of each Plan Year, there shall be allocated to the Deferred Stock Account of each person who
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) is a Deferred Stock Participant on the Annual Valuation Date of that date Plan Year or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) was a Deferred Stock Participant at any time subsequent to the last Annual Allocation Valuation Date, as part of his or her compensation for service on the Board of Directors, up to 7,500 the number of Shares, as may be specified from time to time by resolution of the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This allocation shall in no event be more than the lesser of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) 7,500 Shares or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the number of Shares equal in value to $800,000 minus the directors total cash compensation for the Plan Year (including for this purpose, but not limited to, any cash compensation deferred into this Plan pursuant to an election under Section 4(a) above), as of the Annual Valuation Date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (d)    Interest Credits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Deferred Compensation Accounts of Participants shall be credited with interest computed each Plan Year or portion thereof at a rate equal to 120% of the long-term applicable federal rate, with monthly compounding (as prescribed under section 1274(d) of the Code), as in effect for the month of December for the immediately preceding Plan Year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such interest shall accrue on all Deferral Amounts and prior earnings thereon of Deferred Compensation Accounts and be credited daily to such accounts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (e)    Cash Dividends.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Cash dividends paid on Shares shall be deemed to have been paid on the Shares allocated to each Participants Deferred Stock Account as if the allocated Shares were actual Shares issued and outstanding on the Dividend Record Date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An amount equal to the amount of such dividends shall be credited in Shares to each Deferred Stock Account as of the last Business Day of each month in which a Dividend Payment Date occurs, based upon the closing price for Shares on the New York Stock Exchange on the Valuation Date for that month.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (f)    Capital Adjustments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The number of Shares referred to in the Preamble and Section 5 hereof and the number of Shares allocated to each Deferred Stock Account shall be adjusted by the Plan Administrator, in the event of any subdivision or combination of Shares or any stock dividend, stock split, reorganization, recapitalization, or consolidation or merger with the Company as the surviving corporation, or if additional shares or new or different shares or other securities of the Company or any other issuer are distributed with respect to Shares through a spin-off or other extraordinary distribution.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (g)    Vesting of Accounts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Participant is fully vested in his or her entire Account balance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 6.Distribution of Accounts
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a)    Distribution upon Separation from Service.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Participant shall specify on an Election Form the manner in which the amounts deferred in the Deferred Compensation Account and the Deferred Stock Account, as applicable, for a Plan Year (and earnings thereon) shall be distributed from the Participants Account upon the Participants Separation from Service.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All elections are irrevocable, and no changes shall be permitted to any Election Form delivered to the Plan Administrator, except as specifically provided under the terms of the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Participant may elect, to the extent permitted by the Plan Administrator and set forth on the Election Form, that such portion of the Account be distributed upon a Participants Separation from Service either in:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i)    Lump Sum payment in January of the second Plan Year following the Plan Year in which the Participant's Separation from Service occurs; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii)    Annual Installment payments over a period of two (2) to ten (10) years commencing in January of the second Plan Year following the Plan Year in which the Participant's Separation from Service occurs, with subsequent installment payments to be made in each January within the applicable period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a Participant fails to make a timely payment election on the Election Form for a Plan Year, the amounts deferred in the Deferred Compensation Account and the Deferred Stock Account, as applicable, for such Plan Year (and earnings thereon) shall be distributed in a lump sum in accordance with Section 6(a)(i) hereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b)    Form of Distributions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All distributions of a Participants Deferred Compensation Account under the Plan shall be made in cash.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Except as provided in Section 6(f), all distributions of a Participants
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deferred Stock Account shall be paid in Shares, at which time the Shares shall be issued or transferred from the books of the Company to the Participant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All Shares to be issued or transferred hereunder may be newly issued or treasury shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Fractional Shares shall not be issued or transferred to a Participant, provided that in the case of a final payment under the Plan with respect to a Participant, any fraction remaining in the Participants Deferred Stock Account shall be rounded up to the next whole Share and that number of whole Shares shall be issued or transferred.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The value of the Deferred Stock Account is calculated with reference to the closing price of Shares on the last trading day of the prior Plan Year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c)    Distribution of Account.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company shall distribute amounts from the Participants Deferred Compensation Account and the Deferred Stock Account in the manner and on the date(s) applicable under this Section 6.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the payment option described in Section 6(a)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) hereof is applicable, the amount of the lump sum shall be calculated using the valuation of the applicable portion of the Participants Account as of the December 31 preceding the date of the payment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the payment option described in Section 6(a)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) hereof is applicable, the amount of each installment shall be calculated using the valuation of the applicable portion of the Participants Account as of the December 31 preceding the date of the installment payment divided by the number of installment payments that have not yet been made.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (d)    Distribution upon Death.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notwithstanding any election made by a Participant or any other provision of this Section 6 to the contrary, if a Participant dies before full distribution of his or her Account balance, any remaining balance shall be distributed to the Participants Beneficiary in a lump sum within 90 days following the date of the Participants death.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The amount of such lump sum distribution shall be calculated using the valuation of the Participant's Account as of the date preceding the date of distribution.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any payment required to be made to a Participant under the Plan that cannot be made due to the Participants death shall be made to the Participants Beneficiary, subject to applicable law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Participant shall have the right to designate one or more Beneficiaries, and to change a Beneficiary designation, from time to time by filing a written notice with the Plan Administrator.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event that a Beneficiary does not survive the Participant and no successor Beneficiary is selected, or in the event no valid Beneficiary designation has been made, the Participants Beneficiary shall be the Participants estate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (e)    Unforeseeable Emergency.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon the written request of a Participant, the Plan Administrator may permit the Participant to withdraw some or all of the Participants Account for the purpose of enabling the Participant to meet the immediate needs created by an Unforeseeable Emergency.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The circumstances that will constitute an Unforeseeable Emergency will depend upon the facts of each case, but in any case, the amounts distributed with respect to an Unforeseeable Emergency shall not exceed the amounts necessary to satisfy such Unforeseeable Emergency plus amounts necessary to pay taxes reasonably anticipated as a result of the distribution, after taking into account the extent to which such hardship is or may be relieved through reimbursement or compensation by insurance or otherwise, by liquidation of the Participants assets, to the extent that the liquidation of such assets would not itself cause severe financial hardship, or by cessation of deferrals under the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (f)    Payment of Cash in Lieu of Shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If at any time the Plan Administrator determines that payment of Shares to a Participant (or a Participants Beneficiary) or the ownership or subsequent disposition of such Shares by such Participant or Beneficiary may violate or conflict with any applicable law or regulation, the Plan Administrator shall pay all or a portion of the Participants Deferred Stock Account in cash.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (g)    Withholding Taxes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All distributions of a Participants Account under the Plan shall be subject to income tax and other withholdings that the Plan Administrator deems necessary or appropriate, and the Plan Administrator may reduce the amount credited to any Participants Account to the extent it deems necessary to satisfy tax withholding requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Participants or Beneficiaries receiving distributions under the Plan shall bear all taxes on amounts paid under the Plan to the extent that taxes are not withheld thereon, irrespective of whether withholding is required.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 7.Administrative Matters
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a)    Claims Procedure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any person making a claim for benefits hereunder shall submit the claim in writing to the Plan Administrator.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the Plan Administrator denies the claim in whole or in part, it shall issue to the claimant a written notice explaining the reason for the denial and identifying any additional information or documentation that might enable the claimant to perfect the claim.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The claimant may, within sixty (60) days of receiving a written notice of denial, submit a written request for reconsideration to the Plan Administrator, together
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: with a written explanation of the basis of the request.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan Administrator shall consider any such request and shall provide the claimant with a written decision together with a written explanation thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No legal action may be commenced or maintained against the Plan more than one year after the Plan Administrator wholly or partially denies, or is deemed to have wholly or patially denied, a claim for Plan benefits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All interpretations, determinations, and decisions of the Plan Administrator in respect of any claim shall be final, binding and conclusive.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b)    Incapacity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the Plan Administrator determines that any person entitled to benefits under the Plan is unable to care for his or her affairs because of illness, accident or other physical and mental incapacity, any payment due (unless a duly qualified guardian or other legal representative has been appointed) may be paid consistent with the terms described herein for the benefit of such person to such persons spouse, parent, brother, sister, adult child or other party deemed by the Plan Administrator in its sole discretion to ensure proper care for such person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c)    Inability to Locate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the Plan Administrator is unable to locate a person to whom a payment is due under the Plan for a period of twelve (12) months, commencing with the first day of the month as of which the payment becomes payable, the total amount payable to such person shall be forfeited.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (d)    Liability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any decision made or action taken by the Board of Directors, the Plan Administrator, or any employee of the Company or any of its subsidiaries, arising out of or in connection with the construction, administration, interpretation, or effect of the Plan, shall be absolutely discretionary, and shall be conclusive and binding on all parties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Neither the Plan Administrator nor a member of the Board of Directors and no employee of the Company or any of its subsidiaries shall be liable for any act or action hereunder, whether of omission or commission, by any other member or employee or by any agent to whom duties in connection with the administration of the Plan have been delegated or, except in circumstances involving bad faith, for anything done or omitted to be done.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (e)    Notices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No notice, election or communication in connection with the Plan made or submitted by any Participant, claimant or other person shall be effective unless duly executed and filed with the Plan Administrator (including any of its representatives, agents, or delegates) in the form and manner required by the Plan Administrator.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (f)    Waiver.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No term, condition, or provision of the Plan shall be deemed waived unless the purported waiver is in writing signed by the Plan Administrator.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No waiver signed by the Plan Administrator shall be deemed a continuing waiver unless so specifically stated in the writing, and any such waiver shall operate only for the stated period and only as to the specific term, condition, or provision waived, and shall apply only to the individual or individuals seeking the waiver.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 8.Unfunded Status
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All Accounts and all rights of Participants to benefits under the Plan are unfunded obligations of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Plan benefits shall be paid from the general assets of the Company, and Participants shall have the status of an unsecured general creditor of the Company with respect to all interests under the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan is a plan of unfunded deferred compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notwithstanding the foregoing, the Company may, but shall not be required to, establish a trust or other funding vehicle under the Plan that does not affect the Plans status as a Plan of unfunded deferred compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 9.Nontransferability; Successors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No interest of any person in, or right to receive a distribution under, the Plan shall be subject in any manner to sale, transfer, assignment, pledge, attachment, garnishment, or other alienation or encumbrance of any kind; nor may such interest or right to receive a distribution be taken, either voluntarily or involuntarily for the satisfaction of the debts of, or other obligations or claims against, such person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The obligations of the Company under the Plan will be binding upon the Companys successors, transferees and assigns.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 10.Limitation of Rights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nothing in the Plan shall confer upon any Participant the right to continue to serve as a Director of the Company or to serve in the capacity in which the Participant is employed by the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nothing in the Plan shall be interpreted as creating a right of a Participant to receive any compensation or benefit from the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Participant shall have no rights as a shareholder of the Company with respect to any Shares until the Shares are issued or transferred to the Participant on the books of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 11.Enforceability and Governing Law
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To the extent not preempted by federal law, the Plan shall be construed, administered and enforced in accordance with the laws of the State of Indiana, regardless of the law that might otherwise govern under applicable principles or provisions of choice or conflict of law doctrines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To the extent that any provision of the Plan or portion thereof shall be found to be invalid or unenforceable, it such provision or portion of the Plan shall be considered deleted herefrom and the remainder of such provision and the Plan shall be construed and enforced as if such illegal or invalid provision had never been inserted herein.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the remainder of the Plan shall be unaffected and shall continue in full force and effect.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 12.Forum Selection
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To the fullest extent permitted by law, any action brought in whole or in part relating to the Plan the lawfulness of any Plan provision, the administration of the Plan, or the performance or non-performance of the Plans administrators and fiduciaries, shall be filed in one of the following jurisdictions:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the jurisdiction in which the Plan is principally administered, which is currently the United States District Court for the Southern District of Indiana; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) in the case of a putative class action, the jurisdiction in which the largest number of putative class members resides (or if that jurisdiction cannot be determined, the jurisdiction in which the largest number of class members is reasonably believed to reside).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any action is filed in a jurisdiction other than one of those described above, then the Plan, all parties to such action that are related to the Plan (such as a Plan fiduciary, administrator or party in interest) and all alleged Plan Participants and Beneficiaries shall take all necessary steps to have the action removed to, transferred to or re-filed in a jurisdiction described above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such steps may include, but are not limited to,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) a joint motion to transfer the action; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) a joint motion to dismiss the action without prejudice to its re-filing in a jurisdiction described above, with any applicable time limits or statutes of limitations applied as if the suit or class action allegation had originally been filed or asserted in a jurisdiction described above at the same time that it was filed or asserted in a jurisdiction not described therein.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This forum selection provision is waived, with respect to an action, if no party invokes it within 120 days of the filing of an action.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This provision does not relieve any claimant from any obligation existing under the Plan or by law to exhaust administrative remedies before initiating litigation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 13.Scriveners Errors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan shall be applied and interpreted without regard to any scrivener's error in this instrument.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The determination whether a scrivener's error has occurred shall be made by the Plan Administrator in the exercise of the Plan Administrators best judgment and sole discretion, based on the Plan Administrators understanding of the intent of the Company as settlor of the Plan, and taking into account such evidence, written or oral, as the Plan Administrator deems appropriate or helpful.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan Administrator is authorized to correct any scrivener's errors the Plan Administrator discovers in this instrument, retroactively or prospectively.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 14.Rules of Construction
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For purposes of the Plan, unless the contrary is clearly indicated by the context:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a)the use of the masculine gender in this Plan shall also include within its meaning the feminine gender and vice versa;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: b) the use of the singular shall also include within its meaning the plural and vice versa;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) the word "include" shall mean to include, but not to be limited to;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: d) any reference to a statute or section of a statute shall further be a reference to any successor or amended statute or section, and any regulations or other guidance of general applicability issued thereunder;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (e) the title of an officer, employee, or entity used in this Plan means the respective officer, employee, or entity of Eli Lilly and Company and means any successor title to such position as such title may be changed from time to time;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (f) references to the Plan Administrator, or other named fiduciary, officer or employee of the Company, or other person or entity with responsibility or authority under the Plan shall include delegates (if any) of such entity or person, with respect to such entity's or person's delegated responsibilities; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (g) the captions and headings of each article, section, paragraph, and other provision of the Plan are for convenience and reference only and are not to be considered in interpreting the terms and conditions of the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 15.Effective Date; Amendment and Termination
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan, as amended and restated, shall become effective for the 2009 deferrals on and after January 1, 2017, and for each Plan Year (except as to the share limit specified in Section 5(c), which shall become effective October 20, 2008) and for future Plan Years thereafter until terminated by the Board, contingent upon receiving the approval of the Companys shareholders at the Companys 2017 annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board may amend or terminate the Plan at any time and in any manner; provided that no amendment or termination shall reduce the amount credited to a Participants Account at the time of any such amendment or termination, and no amendment shall be effective that shall cause the Plan to fail to meet the requirements of Section 409A.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon termination of the Plan in accordance with the requirements of Section 409A,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) all future deferrals of compensation will cease,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) all Plan Accounts will continue to receive interest credits (or be invested) as permitted under the Plan, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) all Plan Accounts will be distributed in accordance with the Participants elections under the provisions of the Plan, unless the Company determines in its sole discretion that all such amounts shall be distributed upon termination in accordance with the requirements of Section 409A.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APPENDIX A
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: GRANDFATHERED AMOUNTS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Distribution of amounts that were earned and vested (within the meaning of Section 409A) under the Plan prior to 2005 (and earnings thereon) and are exempt from the requirements of Section 409A shall be made in accordance with the Plan terms as in effect on January 1, 2004, as attached below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: THE LILLY DIRECTORS' DEFERRAL PLAN
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 1.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Establishment of the Plan and Shares Available.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Establishment of Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Plan was established effective January 1, 1996, to permit Directors of the Company who are not salaried employees of the Company to voluntarily defer receipt of some or all of their meeting fees and retainer and to share in the long-term growth of the Company by acquiring, on a deferred basis, an ownership interest in the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This amended and restated Plan is effective January 1, 2004.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares Available.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Subject to adjustment as provided in Section 7.5, the aggregate number of shares of Eli Lilly and Company common stock that may be issued or transferred under this Plan after April 28, 2003, is 750,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The shares may be authorized and unissued shares or treasury shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 2.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Definitions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following terms shall have the definitions set forth in this Section 2:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Allocation Date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The last Business Day in November of each calendar year, or such other annual date, not earlier than the third Monday in February, established by the Committee as the date as of which Shares are allocated to each Share Account in accordance with Section 6.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficiary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The beneficiary or beneficiaries (including any contingent beneficiary or beneficiaries) designate pursuant to subsection 8.3 hereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.3 Business Day.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A day on which the Companys corporate headquarters are open for regular business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Directors and Corporate Governance Committee of the Board of Directors, or any successor committee of the Board of Directors that is charged with matters relating to the compensation of non-employee directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eli Lilly and Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Company Credit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For any calendar year or part thereof, an amount computed, and credited annually to a Participant's Deferred Compensation Account at an annual rate that is equal to one hundred twenty percent (120%) of the applicable federal long-term rate, with compounding (as prescribed under Section 1274(d) of the Internal Revenue Code) that was in effect for the month of December immediately preceding the calendar year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deferred Amount.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The amount of a Monthly Deferral Participant's Monthly Compensation that the Participant elects to defer in accordance with Section 4 hereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deferred Stock Participant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Director who is not, and for the preceding 12 months has not been, a salaried employee of the Company and who becomes a Participant in the Plan in accordance with Section 3 hereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A member of the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dividend Payment Date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The date as of which the Company pays a cash dividend on Shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dividend Record Date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to any Dividend Payment Date, the date established by the Board of Directors as the record date for determining shareholders entitled to the dividend.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Individual Accounts or Accounts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The separate accounts (the Deferred Compensation Account and the Share Account) described in Section 7 hereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When used in the singular, the term shall refer to one of these two accounts, as the context requires.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Monthly Compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For any month, the monthly retainer and the aggregate of all meeting fees, committee fees and committee chairperson fees to which a Director is entitled for services rendered to the Company as a Director during the month, as established from time to time by resolution of the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For avoidance of doubt, Monthly Compensation does not include stock options granted to Directors or the Shares allocated pursuant to Section 6 of this Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Monthly Deferral Participant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Director who is not a salaried employee of the Company and who has elected to defer all or part of his or her Compensation pursuant to the Plan in accordance with Section 4 hereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Participant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Director who is a Deferred Stock Participant, a Monthly Deferral Participant, or both.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Lilly Directors' Deferral Plan, as set forth herein and as it may be amended from time to time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Share.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A share of common stock of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Valuation Date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For any month, the third Monday of the month, or if Shares are not traded on the New York Stock Exchange on such third Monday, the next day on which Shares are traded on the New York Stock Exchange.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 3.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deferred Stock Participants.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Director who participated in The Lilly Non-Employee Directors' Deferred Stock Plan immediately before the effective date of this Plan shall continue as a Deferred Stock Participant on such effective date, and all elections in effect under The Lilly Non-Employee Directors' Deferred Stock Plan shall remain in effect under this Plan, unless and until amended in accordance with this Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thereafter, each person who becomes a Director, and who is not, and for the preceding 12 months has not been, a salaried employee of the Company, shall become a Deferred Stock Participant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 4.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Monthly Deferral Participants.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Director who participated in The Lilly Directors' Deferred Compensation Plan immediately before the effective date of the Plan shall continue as a Monthly Deferral Participant on such effective date, and all elections in effect under The Lilly Directors' Deferred Compensation Plan shall remain in effect under this Plan, unless and until amended in accordance with this Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to the beginning of each calendar year, any Director who is not a salaried employee of the Company may defer the receipt of Monthly Compensation to be earned by the Director during such year by filing with the Company a written election that:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) defers payment of a designated amount (of one Thousand Dollars ($1,000) or more) or percentage of his or her Monthly Compensation for services attributable to the following calendar year or portion thereof (the "Deferred Amount");
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) specifies the payment option selected by the Participant pursuant to subsection 8.2 hereof for such ferred Amount; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) specifies the option selected by the Participant pursuant to Section 5 hereof for such Deferred
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Amount.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The amount deferred may not exceed the Director's aggregate Monthly Compensation for the calendar year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notwithstanding the foregoing, any individual who is newly elected or appointed to serve as a Director may, not later tha
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: thirty (30) days after his election or appointment becomes effective, elect in accordance with the preceding
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: provisions of this Section 4, to defer the receipt of Monthly Compensation earned during the portion of the current calendar year that follows the filing of the election with the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Except as provided in subsections 8.2 and 8.4 hereof, any elections made pursuant to this Section 4 with respect to a calendar year shall be irrevocable when made.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a Participant fails to make an election under section 5 with respect to his or her Deferred Amount for a future calendar year, the Participant's previous election shall remain in effect, provided that the Participant may amend his or her election with regard to a future calendar year at any time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 5.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Form of Deferred Compensation Credits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deferred Compensation Account.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Except with respect to Deferred Amounts which a Monthly Deferral Participant elects to have credited in Shares in accordance with subsection 5.2 hereof, the Deferred Amount shall be denominated in U.S. dollars and credited to the Participant's Deferred Compensation Account pursuant to subsection 7.1 hereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to the beginning of each calendar year, a Monthly Deferral Participant may elect to have all or a percentage of the Deferred Amount for the following calendar year credited in Shares and allocated to the Participant's Share Account pursuant to subsection 7.2 hereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 6.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Allocations to Share Accounts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Allocation of Shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of the Annual Allocation Date of each calendar year, there shall be allocated to the Share Account (as described in Section 7.2 below) of each Deferred Stock Participant who is a Director on that date, as part of his or her compensation for service on the Board of Directors, seven hundred (700) Shares or such other number of Shares, not to exceed 3,000 shares, as may be specified from time to time by resolution of the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 7.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Individual Accounts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company shall maintain Individual Accounts for Participants as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deferred Compensation Account.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company shall maintain a Deferred Compensation Account in the name of each Monthly Deferral Participant who elects to defer the receipt of Monthly Compensation pursuant to Section 4 hereof for a calendar year and does not elect to have the Deferred Amount for such calendar year credited in Shares pursuant to subsection 5.2 hereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Deferred Compensation Account shall be denominated in U.S. dollars, rounded to the nearest whole cent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For each month, Deferred Amounts allocated to a Deferred Compensation Account pursuant to subsection 5.1 hereof shall be credited to the Deferred Compensation Account as of the last Business Day of the month.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Share Account.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company shall maintain a Share Account for each Deferred Stock Participant and for each Monthly Deferral Participant who elects to have a Deferred Amount credited in Shares pursuant to subsection 5.2 hereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Share Account shall be denominated in Shares and maintained in fractions rounded to three (3) decimal places.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares allocated to each Share Account shall be hypothetical and not issued or transferred by the Company until payment is made pursuant to Section 8 hereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For each month, Deferred Amounts allocated to a Share Account pursuant to subsection 5.2 hereof shall be credited to the Share Account as of the last Business Day of the month.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares and, if necessary, fractional Shares, shall be credited based upon the average of the high and low price of Shares on the New York Stock Exchange on the Valuation Date for that month.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accrual of Company Credit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Treasurer of the Company shall determine the annual rate of Company Credit on or before December 31 of each calendar year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This rate shall be effective for the following calendar year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company Credit shall accrue monthly, at one-twelfth of the applicable annual rate, on all amounts credited to a Participant's Deferred Compensation Account, including the Company Credits for prior years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company Credit shall not accrue on any amount distributed to a Participant (or to the Participant's Beneficiary) during the month for which the accrual is determined, except where an amount is distributed to a Beneficiary in the month of the Participant's death.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company Credit for each year shall be credited to each Deferred Compensation Account as of December 31 of that year
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: and shall be compounded monthly.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Cash Dividends.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Cash dividends paid on Shares shall be deemed to have been paid on the Shares allocated to each Participant's Share Account as if the allocated Shares were actual Shares issued and outstanding on the Dividend Record Date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An amount equal to the amount of such dividends shall be credited in Shares to each Share Account as of the last Business Day of each month in which a Dividend Payment Date occurs, based upon the average of the high and low prices for Shares on the New York Stock Exchange on the Valuation Date for that month.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Capital Adjustments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The number of Shares referred to in Sections 1.2 and 6 hereof and the number of Shares allocated to each Share Account shall be adjusted by the Committee, as it deems appropriate in its discretion, in the event of any subdivision or combination of Shares or any stock dividend, stock split, reorganization, recapitalization, or consolidation or merger with Eli Lilly and Company as the surviving corporation, or if additional shares or new or different shares or other securities of the Company or any other issuer are distributed with respect to Shares through a spin-off or other extraordinary distribution.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Account Statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Within a reasonable time following the end of each calendar year, the Company shall render an annual statement to each Participant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The annual statement shall report the number of Shares credited to the Participant's Share Account as of December 31 of that year and the dollar amount, if any, credited to the Participant's Deferred Compensation Account as of December 31 of that year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 8.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Payment Provisions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Method of Payment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All payments to a Participant (or to a Participant's Beneficiary) with respect to the Participant's Deferred Compensation Account shall be paid in cash.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Except as provided in Section 8.5, all payments to a Participant (or to a Participant's Beneficiary) with respect to the Participant's Share Account shall be paid in Shares, at which time the Shares shall be issued or transferred on the books of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All Shares to be issued or transferred hereunder may be newly issued or treasury shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Fractional Shares shall not be issued or transferred to a Participant, provided that in the case of a final payment under the Plan with respect to a Participant, any fraction remaining in the Participant's Share Account shall be rounded up to the next whole Share and that number of whole Shares shall be issued or transferred.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If Shares are not traded on the New York Stock Exchange on any day on which a payment of Shares is to be made under the Plan, then that payment shall be made on the next day on which Shares are traded on the New York Stock Exchange.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Payment Options.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to each calendar year, or within 30 days after becoming a Participant, the Participant shall select a payment election with respect to the payment of one or both of the Participant's Individual Accounts from the following payment elections:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) a lump sum in January of the calendar year immediately following the calendar year in which the Participant ceases to be a Director;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) a lump sum in January of the second calendar year following the calendar year in which the articipant ceases to be a Director;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) annual (or, in the case of the Deferred Compensation Account only, monthly) installments over a period of two to ten years commencing in January of the calendar year following the calendar year during which the Participant ceases to be a Director; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) annual (or in the case of the Deferred Compensation Account only, monthly) installments over a period of two to ten years commencing in January of the second calendar year following the calendar year in which the Participant ceases to be a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a payment option described in paragraphs
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii), above, has been elected, the amount of the lump sum with respect to the Participant's Deferred Compensation Account shall be equal to the amount credited to the Participant's Deferred Compensation Account as of the December 31 immediately preceding the date of the payment, and the amount of the lump sum with respect to the Participant's Share Account shall be equal to the number of Shares credited to the Share Account as of the December 31 immediately preceding the date of payment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a payment option described in paragraphs
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv), above, has been elected, the amount of each installment with respect to the Participant's Deferred
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Account shall be equal to the amount credited to the Participant's Deferred Compensation Account as of the last day of the month immediately preceding the date of a monthly installment payment, or the December 31 immediately preceding the date of an annual installment
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: payment, divided by the number of installment payments that have not yet been made.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The amount of each installment with respect to the Participant's Share Account shall be equal to the number of Shares credited to the Participant's Share Account as of the December 31 immediately preceding the date of an annual installment payment, divided by the number of installment payments that have not yet been made.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Participant may elect that his or her final payment election may control over all prior payment elections.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the Participant fails to elect a payment option, the amount credited to the Participant's Individual Account shall be distributed in a lump sum in accordance with the payment option described in paragraph (i) above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the time of any scheduled payment, if the amount credited to a Participant's Deferred Compensation Account or the value of Shares credited to a Participant's Share Account is less than $25,000, the Committee, in its sole discretion, may pay out the Account in a lump sum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Payment Upon Death.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Within a reasonable period of time following the death of a Participant, the amount credited to the Participant's Deferred Compensation Account and the Shares credited to the Participant's Share Account shall be paid by the Company in a lump sum to the Participant's Beneficiary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For purposes of this subsection 8.3, the amount credited to the Participant's Deferred Compensation Account and the number of Shares credited to the Participant's Share Account shall be determined as of the later of the date of death or the last Business Day of the month prior to the month in which the payment occurs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Participant may designate the Beneficiary, in writing, in a form acceptable to the Committee before the Participant's death.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Participant may revoke a prior designation of Beneficiary and may also designate a new Beneficiary without the consent of the previously designated Beneficiary, provided that such revocation and new designation (if any) are in writing, in a form acceptable to the Committee, and filed with the Committee before the Participant's death.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the Participant does not designate a Beneficiary, or if no designated Beneficiary survives the Participant, any amount not distributed to the Participant during the Participant's life shall be paid to the Participant's estate in a lump sum in accordance with this subsection 8.3.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Payment on Unforeseeable Emergency.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee may, in its sole discretion, direct payment to a Participant of all or of any portion of the Participant's Individual Account balance, notwithstanding an election under subsection 8.2 above, at any time that it determines that such Participant has an unforeseeable emergency, and then only to the extent reasonably necessary to meet the emergency.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For purposes of this section, "unforeseeable emergency" means severe financial hardship to the Participant resulting from a sudden and unexpected illness or accident of the Participant or of a dependent of the Participant, loss of the Participant's property due to casualty, or other similar extraordinary and unforeseeable circumstances arising as a result of events beyond the control of the Participant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The circumstances that will constitute an unforeseeable emergency will depend upon the facts of each case, but, in any case, payment may not be made to the extent that such hardship is, or may be, relieved --
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: i) through reimbursement or compensation by insurance or otherwis
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) by liquidation of the Participant's assets, to the extent the liquidation of such assets would not itself e financial hardship; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) by cessation of deferrals under the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Examples of what are not considered to be unforeseeable emergencies include the need to send a Participant's child to college or the desire to purchase a home.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Payment of Cash in Lieu of Shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If at any time the Committee shall determine that payment of Shares to a Participant (or a Participants Beneficiary) or the ownership or subsequent disposition of such Shares by such Participant or Beneficiary may violate or conflict with any applicable law or regulation, the Committee may, in its discretion, pay all or a portion of the Participants Share Account in cash.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In this case, the amount of cash shall be determined with reference to the average of the high and low trading price for Shares on the December 31 next preceding the date of payment, or if Shares are not traded on that day, the next preceding trading day.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 9.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ownership of Shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Participant shall have no rights as a shareholder of the Company with respect to any Shares until the Shares are issued or transferred to the Participant on the books of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 10.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prohibition Against Transfer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The right of a Participant to receive payments of Shares and cash under the Plan may not be transferred except by will or applicable laws of descent and distribution.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Participant may not assign, sell, pledge, or otherwise transfer Shares or cash to which he is entitled hereunder prior to transfer or payment thereof to the Participant, and any such attempted assignment, sale, pledge or transfer shall be void.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 11.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: General Provisions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director's Rights Unsecured.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan is unfunded.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The right of any Participant to receive payments of cash or Shares under the provisions of the Plan shall be an unsecured claim against the general assets of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Administration.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Except as otherwise provided in the Plan, the Plan shall be administered by the Committee, which shall have the final authority to adopt rules and regulations for carrying out the Plan, and to interpret, construe, and implement the provisions of the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Legal Opinions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee may consult with legal counsel, who may be counsel for the Company or other counsel, with respect to its obligations and duties under the Plan, or with respect to any action, proceeding, or any questions of law, and shall not be liable with respect to any action taken, or omitted, by it in good faith pursuant to the advice of such counsel.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Liability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any decision made or action taken by the Board of Directors, the Committee, or any employee of the Company or any of its subsidiaries, arising out of or in connection with the construction, administration, interpretation, or effect of the Plan, shall be absolutely discretionary, and shall be conclusive and binding on all parties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Neither the Committee nor a member of the Board of Directors and no employee of the Company or any of its subsidiaries shall be liable for any act or action hereunder, whether of omission or commission, by any other member or employee or by any agent to whom duties in connection with the administration of the Plan have been delegated or, except in circumstances involving bad faith, for anything done or omitted to be done.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Withholding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company shall have the right to deduct from all payments hereunder any taxes required by law to be withheld from such payments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The recipients of such payments shall bear all taxes on amounts paid under the Plan to the extent that no taxes are withheld thereon, irrespective of whether withholding is required.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Legal Holidays.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any day on which action under the Plan must be taken falls on a Saturday, Sunday, or legal holiday, such action may be taken on the next succeeding day that is not a Saturday, Sunday, or legal holiday; provided, that this subsection 11.8 shall not permit any action that must be taken in one calendar year to be taken in any subsequent calendar year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Participant Who Becomes Employee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a Participant becomes an employee of the Company but remains a Director, he or she will no longer be entitled to new deferrals under the Plan as a Deferred Stock Participant or Monthly Deferral Participant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the individuals Account balances will continue to be administered under the Plan (including eligibility for the Company Credit and Cash Dividends under Sections 7.3 and 7.4) until they are paid out in accordance with Section 8.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 12.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Term, Amendment, Suspension, and Termination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan shall remain in effect until terminated by the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors shall have the right at any time, and from time to time, to amend, suspend, or terminate the Plan, subject to the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) no amendment or termination shall reduce the number of Shares or the cash balance in an Individual
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Account;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the number of Shares allocated annually pursuant to Section 6 hereof may not be changed more
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: frequently than every calendar year; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) to the extent required by New York Stock Exchange listing rules or applicable law, material amendments shall be submitted to the Companys shareholders for approval.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 13.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Applicable Law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan shall be governed by, and construed in accordance with, the laws of the State of Indiana, except to the extent that such laws are preempted by Federal law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 14.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Effective Date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The effective date of this Plan is January 1, 1996.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nothing herein shall invalidate or adversely affect any previous election, designation, deferral, or accrual in accordance with the terms of The Lilly Directors' Deferred Compensation Plan or The Lilly Non-Employee Directors' Deferred Stock Plan that were in effect prior to the effective date of this Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
